basic.description:
Intermediate study in feminist approaches to the cinema and to films produced by women. Critical examination of critical and theoretical literature, and examples of narrative, documentary, and experimental cinemas.
LEARNING HOURS    108 (36L;24Lb;48P)
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Women and Film

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    A GPA of 2.6 in FILM and (a grade of B- in FILM110 (or 104&106) and 6.0 units in FILM or (GNDS120 and GNDS211 and [GNDS125 or WMNS225] and Level 3 in a GNDS Plan).
